courses.name: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: Learn the basics of programming and software development.

tasks.name: Variables and Data Types
tasks.description: Learn about variables and different data types in programming.

tasks.name: Control Flow
tasks.description: Explore if-else statements and loops for program control.

tasks.name: Functions
tasks.description: Learn how to create and use functions in programming.

courses.name: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Study the basics of web development.

tasks.name: HTML
tasks.description: Study the basics of HTML for web page structure.

tasks.name: CSS
tasks.description: Learn how to style web pages using CSS.

tasks.name: JavaScript
tasks.description: Explore the fundamentals of JavaScript programming language.

courses.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Learn about data structures and algorithms.

tasks.name: Arrays
tasks.description: Understand arrays and their operations.

tasks.name: Linked Lists
tasks.description: Learn about linked lists and their applications.

tasks.name: Recursion
tasks.description: Study recursion and its use in problem-solving.

courses.name: Object-Oriented Programming
courses.description: Study the fundamentals of object-oriented programming.

tasks.name: Classes and Objects
tasks.description: Understand the concept of classes and objects.

tasks.name: Inheritance
tasks.description: Learn about inheritance and its benefits.

tasks.name: Polymorphism
tasks.description: Explore polymorphism and its implementation.

courses.name: Database Design and Management
courses.description: Learn about relational databases and SQL.

tasks.name: Relational Databases
tasks.description: Study the fundamentals of relational databases.

tasks.name: SQL Queries
tasks.description: Learn how to write SQL queries to interact with databases.

tasks.name: Normalization
tasks.description: Understand the process of database normalization.

tasks.name: React
tasks.description: Learn how to build interactive UIs with React.

tasks.name: Angular
tasks.description: Explore the features of the Angular framework.

tasks.name: Vue.js
tasks.description: Study the fundamentals of Vue.js for frontend development.

courses.name: Backend Development
courses.description: Learn how to build server-side applications.

tasks.name: Node.js
tasks.description: Learn how to build server-side applications with Node.js.

tasks.name: Express
tasks.description: Explore the features of the Express.js framework.

tasks.name: RESTful APIs
tasks.description: Understand the principles of designing RESTful APIs.

courses.name: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Study the basics of mobile app development.

tasks.name: Android Development
tasks.description: Learn how to build Android apps using Java/Kotlin.

tasks.name: iOS Development
tasks.description: Explore app development for iOS using Swift.

tasks.name: Cross-platform Development
tasks.description: Study frameworks like React Native for cross-platform app development.
